page.title: 17Dovercourt's Rector's Day:pm
page.content: After lunch, the Rector of Dovercourt pays visits to the local Hospital to minister to Anglican patients. He may also visit mothers and babies in the maternity unit, and see patients at the Day Hsopital. Individual visits are also made to parishioners in their homes as required during the afternoon. At 5.00pm the Rector returns to the church for the evening Office (daily evening service) with other members of the local clergy team. At 5.45pm he goes home for tea and a time with his family. In the evening he attends the church midweek Bible study and prayer group. This meeting usually lasts till about 9.15pm,when the Rector goes home.
